grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 溝渠【コウキョ】ditch, sewer, canal
排水溝【ハイスイコウ】drainage, gutter, ditch
海溝【カイコウ】ocean trench, deep
kun reading compounds: 溝【みぞ】ditch, drain, gutter, trench, groove, tread, gap (between people, countries, etc.), gulf
溝隠【みぞかくし】Chinese lobelia (Lobelia chinensis)
押さえ溝【おさえみぞ】groove in the body of wooden plane which holds the blade
逃げ溝【にげみぞ】clearance groove, under cut
